title: The Stranger: True Love Is Written in the Stars
description: True Love Is Written in the Stars... At least, that's how it appears.For Raven, only daughter of ruling President, Phillipe Andre, and his wife, Adriana Andre, First Lady of the Republic of the United Kingdom, losing her beloved husband in a tragic accident robbed her of her happy ever after.Whispers speak of another way, but one that is forbidden to all.Only those who rule are privy to the secret, but there are those who will always talk and others who are only too willing to listen.Word reaches Raven's ears; could it be her one chance to say a final goodbye to the love of her life?Bringing the heart-breaking case to her father, Raven must convince him to break the laws of the land and send her to a place no other has ever journeyed to before.Immerse yourself in this brand new short story from the dazzling pen of Liverpool based author, DHANI EWING.* This is book one in the 'LOVE LOCKS' series. *
author: Dhani Ewing
